plot: Spin off from an episode of _"Comedy Game, The" (1971)_ and basically a series of vignettes about office life. The lead role in the pilot was played by John Bell although Rod McLennan took over for the series.
plot_en: Spin off from an episode of _"Comedy Game, The" (1971)_ and basically a series of vignettes about office life. The lead role in the pilot was played by John Bell although Rod McLennan took over for the series.

title: Nice Day at the Office
